name: Craig SAUNDERS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; S.C.I., Rockview Incoming Publication Review Committee; S.C.I. Rockview Superintendent Marirosa Lamas; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections Chief Grievance Officer Dorina Varner, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Saunders v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Craig SAUNDERS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; S.C.I., Rockview Incoming Publication Review Committee; S.C.I. Rockview Superintendent Marirosa Lamas; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections Chief Grievance Officer Dorina Varner, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of May, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
